src Directory Reference

Directories

directory  dma
 

Files

file  mcasp_drv.c
 Generic McASP Driver for SYS/BIOS Platform.It uses the EDMA for data transfer.
 
file  mcasp_ioctl.c
 This files contains the ioctl functions required for the Mcasp driver to execute the control commands.
